raw_text: The balcony is located on the  east side, It is next to living room , The size of the room is 04  feet width  and 08  feet length The bathroom is located on the west side, It is between master and kitchen , The size of the room is 5 feet width  and  5 feet length The common room is located on the north east corner, It is next to living room , The size of the room is 10  feet width  and 10  feet length The kitchen is located on the northwest corner, It is next to common and living room , The size of the room is 6  feet width  and 12  feet length The living room is located on the north side, It is in front of all other rooms, The size of the room is 12   feet width  and  27  feet length The master room is located on the southwest corner, It is next to living room , The size of the room is 10 feet width  and 11  feet length
